name: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. The project demonstrates modern web development practices and responsive design principles.

name: Task Management App
description: A React-based task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, user authentication, and real-time updates. Built using modern React hooks and Context API for state management.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather application that displays current weather conditions and forecasts. Integrates with OpenWeatherMap API and features a clean, intuitive user interface built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects. Built with React.js and features smooth animations, responsive design, and modern UI/UX principles. This project demonstrates my front-end development capabilities.

name: Blog Platform
description: A content management system for blogging with features like rich text editing, user roles, and comment system. Built with React frontend and Node.js backend with MongoDB database integration.
